key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including settlements with the SEC and OSC over accounting fraud allegations
Financial performance concerns with consistent losses and volatile stock performance
Intense market competition in the cannabis industry
Ethical and legal scrutiny related to product safety and marketing practices
controversies: Settlements with the SEC and OSC over accounting fraud allegations
Revived investor fraud claims and ongoing securities fraud lawsuits
social_issues: Broader societal implications of cannabis use
Ethical concerns related to product safety and marketing practices
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and legal challenges impacting corporate governance
Discontinuation of analyst coverage by Morningstar, reducing visibility and investor interest
